pyliburo.py3dmodel.OCCUtils.Common.intersect_shape_by_line(topods_shape, line, low_parameter=0.0, hi_parameter=inf)¶

finds the intersection of a shape and a line

Parameters:
  • shape – any TopoDS_*
  • line – gp_Lin
  • low_parameter –
  • hi_parameter –
Returns:

a list with a number of tuples that corresponds to the number

of intersections found the tuple contains ( gp_Pnt, TopoDS_Face, u,v,w ), respectively the intersection point, the intersecting face and the u,v,w parameters of the intersection point :raise:
